Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Morgan Freeman is still alive.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Morgan Freeman died at the age of 80, when he was actually alive at the time.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support from credible sources, as no credible sources reported his alleged passing.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information from the fake news site is true without verifying it through credible sources.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is a celebrity death hoax, as the same site has previously published death hoaxes.
